verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord, praise His holy Name,
Praise the Lord, every day the same;
Praise the Lord, praise His holy Name,
Praise, Oh praise the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He brought me out of bondage,
Praise His Holy Name,
He brought me out of bondage,
Praise His Holy Name,
He brought me out of bondage,
Praise His Holy Name,
Praise, Oh praise the Lord.
